title: Reborn: Prelude (2009) #1
description: Captain America Reborn: Prelude, from Eisner-winning scribe Ed Brubaker and fan favorite artist Luke Ross, reveals just what happens before the hotly anticipated Captain America: Reborn #1 hits stores tomorrow! There may be a way to save Steve Rogers, the man known as Captain America who was brutally gunned down in Captain America #25 and captured the attention of the mainstream media worldwide, but how does the daughter of his arch-enemy the Red Skull play into all this? What does she know about the assassination of the world’s greatest hero? Find out now in this eight-page Captain America Reborn: Prelude.
